snippet: All singles players at the United States Open are getting a big raise, from the record $2.6 million each champion will take home to the $32,000 for everyone who loses in the first round.
abstract: All singles players at the United States Tennis Open are getting a big raise, from the record $2.6 million each champion will take home to the $32,000 for everyone who loses in the first round; other tennis developments noted.
lead_paragraph: All singles players at the United States Open are getting a big raise, from the record $2.6 million each champion will take home to the $32,000 for everyone who loses in the first round.
